About

About

The Company

DigiPli is a New York area consulting firm that helps financial institutions digitize and optimize their Compliance and Anti-MoneyLaundering programs through leveraging the latest intechnological advances.

DigiPli is also developing a Compliance and AML managed utility,which expects to launch in early 2020.

Leadership Team

Jeff Horvath

Co-Founder

Refulator lawyer and compliance executive with 20+ years of experience at law firms and large international financial institutions

Linkedin.com/in/jeff-horvath/
Jeff Ruiz

Co-Founder

Head of Operations. Compliance executive with 17+ years of ‘core’ compliance experience.

Linkedin.com/in/jeffrey-ruiz/

Strategic Partners

Careers
